text: Arthrostylidium simpliciusculum is a species of Arthrostylidium bamboo in the grass family. == Distribution == The species is native to Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, and Peru. == Description == Arthrostylidium simpliciusculum is a tufted perennial with short rhizomes. It grows to between 1 m and 1.2 m in height. == References == == Other websites == * Specimens in United States National Herbarium Category:Bamboo species
title: Arthrostylidium simpliciusculum
